accreditation.inputStr: Bachelor of Technology (B. TECH) - Electronics & Communications Engineering

sections.text: Business Engineering Leader with 20+ years of rich experience in Technology Incubation, Product/Solution Development, Engineering Management, Software Development, Product/Program Management, IT Sales/Business Development and Customer Success/Delivery ➢ Worked with the best Fortune 500 Technology Companies for 15+ years – Intel, Motorola, Qualcomm, Samsung ➢ Key Regions Served – Experience of working with cross-cultural environments Off Shore and On Site - North America, Europe, Asia (Korea/China/Taiwan, APAC/SEA/MEA) ➢ Key Technologies Handled – AI, ML, DL, NLP, Full Stack Development, Cloud technologies, Wireless, Mobile, Embedded SW, Networking SW, Server technologies, Telecom protocol stacks

Business Engineering Skills • Strategic Leadership – Innovation (Problem/Business/Product/Market/Financial Management), Execution (People/Scope/Time) and customer satisfaction (Quality/Delivery/Success) • Software Engineering Management – Concept to Sustenance – Market/Business Requirements gathering, Technology/System Design, Solution/SW/HW Architecture, Design - HLD/LLD, Code Development/Review, Testing, Maintenance, Support Engineering, customers issues, escalation Management • Program/Project/Delivery Management – Plan/People/Release/Risk/Change/Requirement/Stakeholder Management, Agile/Waterfall, Scrum • Product Management – Customer/User/Market/Feature Definition, Benefits, ROI Planning, Roadmaps, Releases, Epics, User stories, backlogs • Sales & Business Development - Liaising with C-Level executives, Go-To-Market Initiatives, Plans/Proposals, Customer Interactions/Relationship Management • Operations - Systems and Processes Development, Productivity improvement, IT infrastructure and Applications Support, Estimation, Budgeting and Cost control/ CAPEX, OPEX, Contract/Vendor Management – SOW/RFQ/RFP Co-ordination Delivered projects based on IT Skills : • Cloud Planforms - AWS/Azure/GCP (SaaS/PaaS/IaaS/On-Premise) • Chatbots - LUIS, Power virtual Agents, Dialog Flow • Frameworks/Full Stack – MEAN/MERN /LAMP/Spring/Django/.NET • Languages - C/C++ /Java/C#/Python/Android/iOS/Python/JavaScript/Node.js/Angular.js/React.js AIML Skills • Machine learning - Supervised/Unsupervised Learning, Regression, Classification and clustering • Linear / Logistic Regression – SVM, KNN, LDA, Decision trees, Random forests, Naïve Bayes, K-Means • Recommender systems, Anomaly detection • Artificial Neural Network (ANN), Deep Learning (DL), Convolutional Neural Network (CNN), Recurrent Neural Network (RNN), LSTM • Transformers – BERT, GPT3, Vision Transformer (ViT) • DL Frameworks/APIs - TensorFlow, Hugging Face, PyTorch, Keras, Fast.ai • Libraries - NumPy, Pandas, SciPy, Matplotlib, Seaborn, OpenCV, Pillow, Requests, Beautiful Soup, Selenium, ScraPy, PyTest, PyUnit • Backpropagation, hyperparameter tuning, feature engineering, word embeddings NLP Skills – EDA, Sentiment Analysis, Text Analytics, NER, Text Classification, Topic modelling, Text Generation/Summarization, QnA Generation, Knowledge graph, chatbots • Spacy, Genism, NLTK, Scikit-Learn, TextBlob, CoreNLP, AllenNLP, Polyglot Azure Machine Learning – Text and speech translation, Face detection, Computer/Custom Vision (OCR), Azure Bot framework (LUIS), Bot composer, Video Indexing service, BOT services, Power virtual Agents

Professional Experience Vice President (AI/ML Practice – Products/Solutions/Services) – Soft path Systems LLC June'2021 to Jul'2022 • Lead a distributed global Engineering team (US, UK, and India) with Software Engineers, Leads, Data Scientists, Product Managers, Data Engineers and stakeholders to deliver artificial intelligence-based talent management SaaS platform which helps the staffing services value chain (www.optevus.com) • Based on .NET/Angular/SQL/Python/Azure Full Stack Technology • Product owner to Incubate, prototype and develop new features in alignment with product roadmaps • Technical owner to sign-off for solution use cases and feasibility • Contribute to bug review and feature enhancements of core products • Responsible for Managing an AI practice of 50+ Engineers • Accountable for Centre of excellence, strategic solutions, alliances, driving innovative solutions and to lead entire vertical operations of the practice • Driven go to market strategies, led Sales/Marketing/Business Development to reach out to • multitude of customers • Built AIML solutions to foster competence with the practice • Signed MOU with NIT Warangal to build the technology incubation of AIML practice As Senior Director (Customer Success/Solution Engineering/Delivery/PS) - KORE.AI (Enterprise Conversational AI, NLP Based Chatbot/ Virtual Assistant Platform) May' 2018 to August' 2020 • Lead customer Digital transformation journey – Onboarding of multitude of customers for Building AI/ML/NLP based Enterprise/consumer Bots using kore platform/solutions • Key customers include – Citibank, Deutsche Bank, Bank of America, Phillips (Signify), ABI, Verizon etc. • Define, design & deliver customer Objectives - Bot use case blueprinting, conversational design, development and deployment of Bot life cycle Management • Handled $4 Million Professional services order and $20 Million product licensing renewals involving 30+ customers and 40+ cross functional team members to deliver top line growth • Customer Success - Provide professional services and analyze key metrics, nurture relationships by delivering constant value • Strategic thinking and thought partnership to define future roadmaps • Exposure to full stack technology and Amazon Web Services (AWS) cloud infrastructure web application frameworks • Interfaced with CIO's/Business leaders/Digital transformation stakeholders/IT managers to understand the conversational AI use cases • Designed customer success statements to achieve KPIs to improve productivity, cost reduction and business process automation and optimization • Owned end-to-end design, hands-on development, and launch of AI algorithms/solutions that improve customer experience • Driven technical workshops to create the blue-prints and gathered requirements • Developed and reviewed Dialog/Conversational design flows to complete AI/ML solutions using Intent recognition and Entity extraction using • Worked with engineers, developers, Business/NLP analysts, IT/Solution architects to accomplish the Bot development, training, testing, deployment and support life cycle • Exposure to Build Enterprise Bot Platform using MEAN full stack technology Senior Director (Head of Engineering/Technology/Professional Services/Delivery), Votary Soft tech Solutions Feb'2016 to Feb '2018 • Responsible for 250+ strong team in driving the end-to-end product/solutions/services across IoT (Internet of things), Mobility and Digital technologies. Responsible for technology incubation, engineering architecture, business, customers, growth, P&L and strategic initiatives. Delivered growth of ~ 30% in 2 years. • SW Architect of IoT general-purpose stack. Designed an IoT Decision Intelligence Pipeline Model which addresses all the workflows for different Smart verticals. It comprises of sensor/device/data management, adaptable messaging frameworks acting like transport layers, on-chip/server/cloud storage provisioning, Smart Logic involving business logic, analytics, visualization and more importantly the smart Applications • Managed a practice (Embedded systems, Storage, Applications, and Testing) building teams and competency, managing the hiring, competency development, supporting business development, building technologies and demonstration products. Scaled up ~100 people in a span of 9 months.

Skills: Technology Incubation / Organizational Development / Thought Leadership / Concept creation / Fostering Innovation, Developing Technology Solutions / People Engagement, Relationship and Retention / Resource Management (Team Seeding, building, motivation & scaling) / Proposals, Plans and Business Development / Systems and Processes Development / Budgeting & ROI Planning / Productivity improvement

Group Head (Corporate Principal Engineer / Senior Development Manager) South west Asia & Middle East Asia), Samsung R&D Institute June' 2013 to Feb'2016 • Responsible for all aspects of software for Samsung smart phones/Tablets in ~25 countries and generating ~1.5 billion USD Revenue streams. • Managed 10+ Direct reports and team size of ~100 (DGMs/Sr.DMs/DMs/CEs/PLs/LEs/Engineers). As a part of Strategic Platform group managed Technology teams (Android UI/Framework, CSC {Customer Specific customizations}, Network/telephony/multimedia Applications) and SW Project Management teams (Concept/Requirements/Development/Schedules/Build/Automation/Integration/Testing/Release/Commertialization) • Delivered 15+ New Models and 90+ Active Models in parallel within constrained timelines, multiple milestones and consistently met project schedules. • Adopted a pragmatic approach in improvising on innovative engineering solutions and resolving complex business issues for multiple customer segments (B2C/B2B/Operators/Silicon Vendors). Multi-sided Platform enabled $1.5M revenue streams across customer segments. • Built concrete customer relationships with Samsung customer service centers across regions and LTE Operators (Majorly Reliance JIO in India). • Consistently followed a highly customer centric, systems/data driven approach in designing Engineering & Business solutions. Continuously monitored programs/Projects. Demonstrated active delegation and issue resolution with aggressive TAT, Risk management and Senior Management reporting. • Established robust processes with complete support of R&D partners for the delivery of value-added products/services to customers. • Expertise in Mobile wireless products (Smartphones/Tablets/Wearable/IoT) Engineering processes, design, development, Launch and Product Leadership.

Skills: People Management / Scope, Schedule, Resource / Risk Management - mitigation/Contingency / Change Management / Stakeholder Management / Metrics/Dashboards / Continuous Issue Monitoring / Leadership / Executive Status Reporting

Founder, Proprietor (Self Employed)– VGROWIT July'2012 to June'2013 VGROWIT (MPowering Businesses) Explored business entrepreneurial options by enabling Mobile Applications across various Devices, platforms to address different Business sectors (Health, Education, Banking, Insurance, Automobiles etc.) • Business Planning/Consulting • Product/Engineering Management • Program/Operations Management Senior Technology SW Program manager, Qualcomm Nov'2007 to Jul' 2012 • Linux Android Technology software Management: Seeded, built, successfully managed Linux team and delivered multiple Linux Android phone launches. Involved right from seeding Linux android team (since FY-2007) and seeing the sprout growing up to a leadership team of 250+ engineers. Engaged in the journey with Google's Android OS launch through the latest Jellybean's plans. Delivered Android releases right from cupcake, donut, Éclair, FroYo, Gingerbread, Ice-cream sandwich OS versions integrated on to Qualcomm chipsets encompassing 7k/8k chipsets. Business/Engineering understanding of Mobile Eco-system (OEMs, Carriers, and ISVs, Developer community) to define and generate business/revenue streams • Target Software program Management: QSC1100/1110 ULC (ultra-low cost) chipset derivative Product lines - Driven integration of new 3rd party "User Interface" on the Qualcomm Brew platforms - Involved in building the "Mango Technologies-Qualcomm partnership" to get Mango framework (MAF) commercial shipment ready status on the QCT chipset

Skills: Program Management / Scope, Schedule, Resource / Requirements Management / Plan of Record / Risk Management - mitigation/Contingency / Change Management / Stakeholder Management / Metrics/Dashboards / Continuous Issue Monitoring / Business Continuity planning / Strategy planning, alignment to business goals / Leadership / Executive Status Reporting • Linux / Android / C / Open Source • Multimedia framework (Audio/Video/Display/Camera/Graphics)/Kernel/HW/Power/Memory/Performance • Connectivity - LTE/BT/Wi-Fi/4G/

Program Lead, Solectron (Flextronics company) Apr'2007 to Nov'2007 • Plan, lead and manage Intel based ATCA Server SW Program; Skills: Embedded Systems / Program Management Senior Software Engineer, Motorola Oct'2005 to Mar '2007 • Lead a junior team in software development of carrier class/next generation telecom equipment (communication servers) module. Ownership of the software development of PrAMC7201 AMC blade Skills: Embedded Systems / Software Development / C / Micro-controllers / Linux Senior Software Engineer, INTEL Feb'2001 to Oct'2005 • INTEL - IA-32, Server Management software Development: • Involved in IPMI (Intelligent Platform Management Interface) 2.0 common core and platform evolution phase of the Baseboard Management controller (BMC, ARM7TDMI based) in a cross-site design and development initiative. This includes design & development, testing, integration and porting of platform drivers and core features • Point of contact (POC) for the development Centers at Taiwan and Korea (ODCs) for both the mBMC (mini-Baseboard Management Controller) for almost 8 different server platforms. Visited the development Centers at Korea & Taiwan for training the firmware engineers and board bring up • Ensure timely delivery of commitments from the ODCs and provide technical support to the ODCs interacting with cross-site (Oregon & Dupont) multi-functional development teams Skills: Embedded Systems / IPMI / Firmware Development / C / Micro-controllers / RTOS Specialist – TATA ELXSI Jan'1999 to Feb'2001 • IPv4 over IEEE 1394 RFC 2734 (Firewire Architecture) Software Development, TCP/IP stack for ATM to HDLC Bridging Device • Enabling Voice Processing Engine (VPE) of VOIP Media Gateway (This was done at "Empower Tel Networks", San Jose, California) Skills: Embedded Systems / TCP-IP / ATM / IEEE 1394 / C / Micro-controllers / RTOS

Education • Machine learning – Stanford Online – 11 Week - Authorized by Stanford University, Dec-2017 • PGCBM (Post graduate certificate in Business management), XLRI, Jamshedpur, India. June-2004 • Master of Engineering (M.E) - Electronics & Controls (Full Time @ Campus) Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS), Pilani, India. December-1998 • Bachelor of Technology (B. TECH) - Electronics & Communications Engineering from Acharya Nagarjuna University, AP, India (Regular course), May-1997

Licenses & certifications DeepLearning.AI • Improving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization - Issued Mar 2018 • Structuring Machine Learning Projects - Issued Mar 2018 • Neural Networks and Deep Learning - Issued Nov 2017 Indian Institute of Technology, Kharagpur • Introduction to Machine Learning - Issued Jul 2017

skills.name: Registration Evaluation Authorisation And Restriction Of Chemicals (REACH) Regulations
